title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH (Table Header?), selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not result in any action. Either the menu option should be removed or, preferably, selecting the option should add Javadoc to the field.
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu in TH, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu in TH, Javadoc should be added to the field.
SR:
1. Open the TH (Table Header)
2. Right-click on a field
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the field
